column6: TEENAGE WASTELAND PART 1 Still on the run from their super-villain parents, this motley crew of superpowered kids finds a kindred spirit in a daring young stranger.
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | letterer:Randy Gentile | penciller:Takeshi Miyazawa | colorist:Christina Strain | writer:Brian K. Vaughan | inker:Craig Yeung
